member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.Minimum
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum value of the range of the control.
member.value: The minimum value of the range. Must be greater than or equal to 0. The default is 0.
member.remarks: This property specifies the lower limit of the property.

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.Maximum
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum value of the range of the control.
member.value: The maximum value of the range. Must be greater than or equal to 0. The default is 100.
member.remarks: This property specifies the upper limit of the property.

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the current position of the progress bar.
member.value: The position within the range of the progress bar. The default is 0.
member.remarks: The minimum and maximum values of the Value property are specified by the and properties. This property enables you to set the value of the progress bar directly.

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.Step
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount by which a call to the method increases the current position of the progress bar.
member.value: The amount by which to increment the progress bar with each call to the method. The default is 10.

remarks.p: You can use the Step property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar.
For marquee styled progress bar, this property specifies the amount the progress bar block moves each time.

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.RightToLeft
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether control's elements are aligned to support locales.
member.value: true if control's elements should be aligned to the right; otherwise false. The default is false.

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.BarBlockWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the block.
member.value: The width (in pixels) of the block. Must be greater than or equal to 2. The default is 10.
member.remarks: BarBlockWidth property specifies the width of the block used to draw the progress bar when is or .

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.BarBlockSpace
member.summary: Gets or sets the space between blocks.
member.value: Space (in pixels) between blocks. Must be greater than or equal to 1. The default is 2.
member.remarks: BarBlockSpace property specifies the width of the sapce between blocks used to draw the progress bar when is or .

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.BarMargins
member.summary: Gets or sets the space between the edges of a control and its contents.
member.value: A representing the space between control's edges and its contents. The default is 1 for all edges.

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.BarFillStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets a style of how to fill the progress bar.
member.value: A indicating how to fill the progress bar with or .

member.summary: Gets or sets the style of the border of the progress bar.
member.value: The style of how the border of the progress bar is drawn. The default is .

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.BarBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the border of the progress bar.
member.value: A used to draw the border of the progress bar.

member.summary: Gets or sets an for the progress bar.
member.value: An used to draw the progress bar. The default is null.

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.BarImageTransparentColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a transparent color for .
member.value: A used to determine, which pixels from are transparent (not drawn). The default is .
member.remarks: color indicates that all pixels from are drawn (No transparency).

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.MarqueeAnimationSpeed
member.summary: Gets or sets the time period, in milliseconds, that it takes the progress block to scroll across the progress bar.
member.value: The time period, in milliseconds, that it takes the progress block to scroll across the progress bar. The default is 100.

remarks.p: A marquee-style progress indicator does not display progress; instead it indicates that an operation is occurring by moving the progress block across the progress bar.
Since the marquee animation speed is a time period, setting the value to a higher number results in a slower speed and a lower number results in a faster speed.
The speed of the marquee animation also depends on property.

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.MarqueeBlockCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of blocks within progress block in marquee animation.
member.value: Number of blocks within progress block. The default is 3.
member.remarks: A MarqueeBlockCount is valid for only.

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.MarqueeWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of progress block in marquee animation.
member.value: The width (in pixels) of progress block. The default is 20.
member.remarks: A MarqueeWidth is valid for only.

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.MarqueeStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the style of the marquee animation.
member.value: A indicating style of movement of the progress block. The default is .

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.Text
member.summary: Gets the text associated with this control.
member.remarks: A Text property returns text formatted by . To change text, use property.

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.ForeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the text color.
member.value: The text . The default is .

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.Font
member.summary: Gets or sets the font of text.
member.value: The of text.

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.TextOutputFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of text.
member.value: Formatting of text. The default is "{0:P0}".
member.remarks:
In TextOutputFormat, you can use four optional parameters:
{0} - float value representing percentage (in range 0.0F to 1.0F)
{1} - value from property
{2} - value from property
{3} - value from property

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.TextAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets horizontal alignment of text.
member.value: A of text. The default is .

remarks.p: property does not affect this property.
Text is vertically always aligned to center.

member.name: P:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBar.ShowText
member.summary: Gets or sets the visibility of text.
member.value: true if text should be visible; otherwise false. The default is false.

member.name: T:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBorderStyle
member.summary: Specifies the style used to draw the border.

member.name: F:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBorderStyle.None
member.summary: No border.

member.name: F:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBorderStyle.Solid
member.summary: Rectangular border.

member.name: F:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBorderStyle.Rounded
member.summary: Border with rounded corners.

member.name: T:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBarStyle
member.summary: Specifies the style that a progress bar uses to indicate the progress of an operation.

member.name: F:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBarStyle.Blocks
member.summary: Indicates progress by increasing the number of segmented blocks.

member.name: F:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBarStyle.ContinuousBlocks
member.summary: Indicates progress by smoothly increasing the number of segmented blocks.

member.name: F:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBarStyle.Continuous
member.summary: Indicates progress by increasing the size of a smooth, continuous bar.

member.name: F:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBarStyle.MarqueeBlocks
member.summary: Indicates progress by continuously scrolling blocks in a marquee fashion.

member.name: F:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBarStyle.MarqueeContinuous
member.summary: Indicates progress by continuously scrolling smooth continuous block in a marquee fashion.

member.name: T:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBarFillStyle
member.summary: Specifies the style which is used to draw the bar using gradient or image.

member.name: F:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBarFillStyle.Stretched
member.summary: Gradient or image is stretched to the actual width of the bar.

member.name: F:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBarFillStyle.FixedToControl
member.summary: Gradient or image is fixed to the with of the full bar (100%) and only required part of it is drawn.

member.name: F:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarBarFillStyle.FixedToBlock
member.summary: Gradient or image is repeatedly drawn in each block. When is set to , this is the same as Stretched style.

member.name: T:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarMarqueeStyle
member.summary: Specifies how the marquee block is moved.
member.remarks: To change the direction, set property to negative value.

member.name: F:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarMarqueeStyle.Move
member.summary: Marquee block moves from left to right.

member.name: F:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarMarqueeStyle.MoveInside
member.summary: Marquee block moves from left to right and also wraps around the edges.

member.name: F:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarMarqueeStyle.Bounce
member.summary: Marquee block moves from left to right and back moving outside of control's area at the edges.

member.name: F:Resco.Controls.ProgressBar.ProgressBarMarqueeStyle.BounceInside
member.summary: Marquee block moves from left to right inside control's area.
